sys_openapi_operation.name: Add/Edit Credit Card
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Add/Edit Credit Card","fOperationId":"createCreditCard","fDescription":"Adds/edit credit card information to your Account.
Only one credit card can be associated with your Account, so using this endpoint will overwrite your currently active card information with the new credit card.
","fPath":"/account/credit-card","fHttpMethod":"POST","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fDescription":"Update the credit card information associated with your Account.","fRequired":true,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"requestapplicationjson6390313024","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[{"fName":"card_number","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":23,"fMinLength":13,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"Your credit card number. No spaces or dashes allowed.","fFormat":"PAN","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"expiry_month","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"A value from 1-12 representing the expiration month of your credit card.

 * 1 = January
 * 2 = February
 * 3 = March
 * Etc.
","fFormat":"int32","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"},{"fName":"expiry_year","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"A four-digit integer representing the expiration year of your credit card.
The combination of `expiry_month` and `expiry_year` must result in a month/year combination of the current month or in the future. An expiration date set in the past is invalid.
","fFormat":"int32","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"}],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"Credit Card updated.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson7230177102","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"default","fDescription":"Error","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson4009828797","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[{"fName":"errors","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"responseapplicationjson4009828797","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/ErrorObject","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[]}
